entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
